atlantisdiagnostics: Tools for calibrating Atlantis ecosystem models

Source: R/atlantisdiagnostics.r
atlantisdiagnostics-package.Rd

Tools to aid in diagnosing issues in a parameterized Atlantis Ecosystem model

Details

  • Determine functional group persistence over time

  • Determine functional group stability over time

  • Determine functional group biomass (relative to historic data) lie within reasonable bounds

  • Determine distribution of biomass over age classes

  • Determine maximum size (length and weight) of species relative to observations

References

To learn more about using atlantisdiagnostics, start with the vignette: browseVignettes(package="atlantisdiagnostics") or click the index below
